revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Frost Cavern |image = [[File:Frost Cavern.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Frost Cavern. |tokens = 665,500 |location = East of Route 15. }} '''Frost Cavern''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 8,537,490 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
